DocumentationDefinitionList.Title: CMIS: Standard CMIS properties filled with resource attributes
DocumentationDefinitionList.Heading: Standard CMIS properties filled with resource attributes

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The internal OpenCms structure id of the resource.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The name of the user who last modified the resource.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The date on which the resource was last modified.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The name of the user who created the resource.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: The date when the resource was created.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: A dynamic property which is handled by a custom property provider class configured in opencms-importexport.xml, as described above.
